entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:25 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of snow near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
